definitions.title: coll.
definitions.body: Ships, fleet—abs. 1Ki 9:26 +; cstr. 1Ki 10:11 +;—of Sol. 1Ki 9:26, 1Ki 9:27; called [[תַרְשִׁישׁ]] ´[[א]] (i.e. large, sea-going vessels, such as sail to Tarshish) 1Ki 10:22, 1Ki 10:22; [[חִירָם]] ´[[א]] 1Ki 10:11, 1Ki 10:22; propelled by oars [[־שַׁיִט]]´[[א]] Is 33:21.
